subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal fought off a challenge from Novak Djokovic, 7-5, 2-6, 6-2, Saturday at the Hamburg Masters to set up another final against the defending champion Roger Federer.
snippet: Rafael Nadal fought off a challenge from Novak Djokovic, 7-5, 2-6, 6-2, Saturday at the Hamburg Masters to set up another final against the defending champion Roger Federer.
